phrases: Long ago, there was a warrior.
In order to protect his friend, the warrior took his friend's life.
Long ago, there was a sword.
This sword had continued to fight for the sake of peace.
It realized that in order to protect the peace, it had no choice but to kill the one who wielded it.
Thus it took its master's life.
The warrior and the sword had no choice but to do as they did, but was that really what they ought to have done?
Uncertain of the answer even now, they wander aimlessly.
There is nowhere else left to look...
Do not worry, Tutu is not around anymore.
tried to restore a piece of my heart.
Yes, Kraehe, dressed like a black bird took my heart shard and...
Tell me, Fakir, do not I...
Do not I need to regain my heart?
I brought you back here, because I thought it would be safer with people around.
Put your worries to rest and sleep.
Why did you bring me with you?
What do you mean that I brought you with me?
You want to know a lot of things, do not you?
I understand how you feel, because I am the desire for knowledge.
You do not remember how you brought me here?
Why do you don black feathers?
Do you have a special power dwelling within you?
Come on, tell me, which is the real you?
Confessing your love at the window?!
It was like a reverse Romeo and Juliet!
Though, it is horribly different since it is one-sided.
That is not what I was doing.
He has not been to class in a long time now, has he?
That is why you could not contain yourself and resolved to confess, right?
Take this chance to attack, attack, attack all the way!
Though, you have no hope, since Mytho-sama has Rue-chan.
I am telling you, that is not it!
Go for it and take your losses!
He might show up to school today.
You are hopeful, are not you?
I wonder if Mytho will come?
If he does, you have to say it properly and clearly, okay?
I cannot say that to him!
Because if I said that, I would disappear...
I looked all over town, but I could not find you, so I was wondering what had happened to you.
But I was so relieved to see you were okay and...
But I am really glad you are okay.
That is right, he does not know that I am Tutu, so...
If you go near him again, I will make sure you pay for it.
So what happened in the end?
She got turned down in a somewhat subdued manner, did not she?
We will just have to get her to do a revenge match.
I saw Tutu return a piece of Mytho's heart to him.
Mytho also wished for its return...
Then, I saw that, and after that...
I ended up skipping the morning classes...
The look in Fakir's eyes that time was scary.
Mytho should not be with someone like that.
You see, Edel-san, I want to save Mytho from Fakir.
But Fakir told me not to go near him.
So... or rather... but, but um...
The name of this gem is Courage.
It is a single gem made of two.
A single gem made of two...
Meaning that I should work together with someone?
I cannot put Rue-chan in danger.
Restore my heart to me, Tutu.
If... If I let Mytho know that I am Tutu...
Then, together, we might be able to stand up... to Fakir.
What is he to you, Ahiru?
He is not really anything to me.
But he is a dangerous person to Mytho.
Quack, quack, quack, quack, quack, quack!
There is no way you are going to find food in there.
I guess you would not have wandered in if you knew.
Somehow, it was like he was not the usual Fakir.
If you go near him again, I will make sure you pay for it.
Of course, he is definitely a bad guy!
I am not going to be fooled just because the bread was tasty!
He probably acted like that only because I was just a duck...
If I am going to tell Mytho everything, I better tell him that I am just a duck too, should not I?
Ahiru says she has something important to tell me.
I will be waiting in the school's backyard at 5 of the clock this evening, Ahiru.
Did the girl not hear what I said to her?
There is no need for you to go.
What would be the point in seeing her?
She might know something about Tutu.
You idiot, there is no way she would.
Do not get involved with Tutu.
Her existence will only bring you unhappiness.
And right now, there is that Kraehe coming after you too.
If I tell you no, it is no!
So, I can no longer stop Mytho with words.
That is the prince's own sword, which once shattered his heart.
Now, what do you plan to do with it?
This sword shattered the prince's heart and destroyed the evil raven.
Now, grant it power once more.
You know about Tutu, do not you, Ahiru?
Fakir told me that I should not come here, but...
You talked to Fakir about this?
Right, everything I tell Mytho goes straight to Fakir too.
When I think of Tutu, I become filled with the desire to see her.
I want to be with Tutu always.
My prince, you belong to me.
That is right, that is the spirit.
The value of a treasure is most clearly revealed when it is fought over.
Now, who will the prince go to, Princess Tutu?
Your hair, your cheeks, and even your heart all belong to me.
Please return the piece of his heart that you took.
Please stop making the prince suffer.
Look, my prince, there is the one making you suffer.
The one you need is me.
I will always be with you.
You are like a doll, but I will love you.
I will make you forget about Tutu.
We shall just give this heart thing to the crows.
Do not address me so familiarly, you filth!
Are you a manifestation of the raven?!
I am sorry you had to wait so long, Mytho.
It will be all right now.
You will not have to suffer.
What are you going to do?
I will shatter your heart for you once again.
It is no use now, Princess Tutu!
Why did you do such a terrible thing?
This would never have happened if you had not shown up.
If I pierce my heart with this sword, will that satisfy you, Fakir?
Then, you will return to your old self.
You would rather be without a heart?!
The other day, you smiled just a little, remember?
That time, I thought that must be the real you.
I think if your heart is full, you will show even more of yourself!
Because that is the real you!
I cannot save you from the suffering, because all I can do is restore your heart to you.
So that is the answer you have chosen.
I want to know what you think of me.
I am really only a bird.
But what the prince sees is Princess Tutu in her beautiful dress.
Was what the sword pierced the prince's heart?
That is who I have always been.
Once again, Princess Tutu will change Mytho.
Kraehe, why are you in such pain?
That is right, I am a crow.
And I am the TRUE prima donna, Princess Kraehe.
All you children who love stories, come gather around.
The voice calling, come now, wake up
The brilliant light and the dew on trees are born
By the secret water's edge that no one knows of
Dance the pas de deux of life
It is a gentle, yet fierce current
How far does the labyrinth stretch?
I loved like I was dreaming
I thought how wonderful it was to be alive
I want to be there for you
Passing by even the wind and the rain clouds
